Job Posting:170826 - Position: F25 Co-op Student - Data, AI, and Analytics (DNA) 170826B Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 06/25/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 06/18/2025 02:54 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 Address Line 2 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country CI Financial 15 York Street 2nd Floor Toronto LSJ 0A3 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Salary Currency Salary Job Description About Us 2025 - Fall F25 Co-op Student - Data, AI, and Analytics (DNA) 170826B Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 months CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List At CI, we see a great place to work as one that is a safe place for everyone to have a voice, where people are empowered to take ownership over meaningful work, where there is an opportunity to grow through stretching themselves, where they can work on innovative products and projects, and where employees are supported and engaged in doing so. Overview CI Global Asset Management (CIGAM), one of Canada's largest asset management companies, is trusted by approximately 1.3 million Canadians to help realize their financial goals. During these unprecedented times, our clients, employees, and business partners remain at the heart of everything we do. When it comes to hiring, the right fit is essential. CI employees must be comfortable in a fast-paced environment in an industry that's always changing. A healthy dose of ambition, a willingness to go the extra mile, and a strong sense of camaraderie are what we look for in our team members. We are currently hiring for two roles. The primary function of these roles is to assist various teams within the Business Analytics & Insights (BA&I), Data Operations, and Governance teams, which are part of the Data, AI, and Analytics(DNA)department. The DNA department is a central unit available to support the company with their analytical needs. This includes enabling a top-down analytical overview of CI's operations, specifically regarding data management, reporting, and insights. Using your strong technical background and knowledge of data analytics, you will assist the CIGAM DNA department with projects to build analytical tools and data visualizations to enhance insights into CI's operations. Successful candidates will have the opportunity to work and interact with various stakeholders across the organization, including the sales team, investment managers, key operations leaders, and more. This role offers a unique chance to collaborate with diverse teams and contribute to impactful initiatives. What You Will Do • Collaborate on projects to curate and analyze information from various data analytics systems. • Develop and enhance data dashboards to provide insightful visualizations. • Design and implement data structures in CI's Snowflake and AWS cloud environments to facilitate comprehensive reporting. • Curate foundational data sets to standardize reporting across CI's teams. Address ad hoc analytical requests from various CI teams, providing timely and accurate insights. • What You Will Bring • Currently pursuing a University degree in Math, Engineering, Computer Science or Business. Strong technical background with experience in • Databases/SQL. • Proficiency in functional programming languages such as Python, C#, Java, R, Matlab, or similar. • Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. • Proficiency in Microsoft Office and VBA. • Demonstrates a keen interest in data analytics and a strong desire to learn. • Excellent written and verbal communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills. Ability to work effectively in a team environment. • What We Offer • Recognition & Compensation • Training & Development • Health & Well-being • Communication & Feedback We are focused on building a diverse and inclusive workforce. • If you are excited about this role and are not confident you meet all the qualification requirements, we encourage you to apply to investigate the opportunity further. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Yes Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://careers.cifinancial.com/jobs/16286502-co-op-student-data-ai-and-analytics-dna Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
